template:
INSERT INTO articles (discovery_date,title,summary,link,published_date,source,relevant)
VALUES (strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", "NOW"),"{{article.title}}","{{article.description}}","{{{article.url}}}","{{article.pubdate}}","{{{article.source}}}",NULL)

VALUES (current_timestamp,'{{article.title}}','{{article.description}}','{{{article.url}}}',{{article.pubdate}},{{source}},NULL);

payload: select article_id,link from articles where source = 1 and published_date is null order by article_id desc limit 10;
SELECT * FROM articles  WHERE source = 7 AND summary ='not available' ;

template:
SELECT "public"."articles"."article_id" AS "article_id", "public"."articles"."title" AS "title", "public"."articles"."summary" AS "summary", "public"."articles"."link" AS "link", "public"."articles"."published_date" AS "published_date", "public"."articles"."source" AS "source", "public"."articles"."relevant" AS "relevant", "public"."articles"."sent_to_admin" AS "sent_to_admin", "public"."articles"."ml_prediction_gnb" AS "ml_prediction_gnb", "public"."articles"."ml_prediction_lr" AS "ml_prediction_lr", "public"."articles"."sent_to_subscribers" AS "sent_to_subscribers", "public"."articles"."discovery_date" AS "discovery_date", "public"."articles"."sent_to_twitter" AS "sent_to_twitter", "public"."articles"."noun_phrases" AS "noun_phrases"
FROM "public"."articles"
WHERE ("public"."articles"."summary" IS NULL
    OR "public"."articles"."summary" = '') and "public"."articles"."source" = 7

payload: SELECT * FROM articles  WHERE source = 10 AND summary ='not available' OR summary is null OR summary = '';

template: update articles set published_date ='{{datetime}}' where article_id  = {{article_id}};

name: populate missing values of published date

payload: SELECT 	article_id, 	link FROM 	articles WHERE 	source = 10 	AND published_date IS NULL ORDER BY 	article_id DESC LIMIT 10;

template:
SELECT
	"public"."articles"."article_id" AS "article_id",
	"public"."articles"."title" AS "title",
	"public"."articles"."summary" AS "summary",
	"public"."articles"."link" AS "link",
	"public"."articles"."published_date" AS "published_date",
	"public"."articles"."source" AS "source",
	"public"."articles"."relevant" AS "relevant",
	"public"."articles"."sent_to_admin" AS "sent_to_admin",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_gnb" AS "ml_prediction_gnb",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_lr" AS "ml_prediction_lr",
	"public"."articles"."sent_to_subscribers" AS "sent_to_subscribers",
	"public"."articles"."discovery_date" AS "discovery_date",
	"public"."articles"."sent_to_twitter" AS "sent_to_twitter",
	"public"."articles"."noun_phrases" AS "noun_phrases"
FROM
	"public"."articles"
WHERE ("public"."articles"."summary" IS NULL
	OR "public"."articles"."summary" = '') AND "source" = 10;
